definition[0]: to make someone feel slightly angry and unhappy about something
example[0]: What annoyed him most was that he had received no apology.
example[1]: She annoyed him with her stupid questions.
example[2]: It really annoys me when I see people dropping litter.
explanation[0]: In everyday English, people also often use the phrase get on someone's nerves:
example[3]: She got on his nerves with her stupid questions.
